statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, points FROM loyalty_program WHERE points > 100;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, points FROM loyalty_program WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, SUM(points) AS total_points FROM loyalty_program GROUP BY customer_id, customer_name;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE purchase_history ->> 'item' = 'Shoes';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, points * 0.1 AS cashback FROM loyalty_program WHERE points >= 500;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT loyalty_program_id, program_name FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_points WHERE points > 100;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_program_id, points FROM customer_points WHERE loyalty_program_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT loyalty_program_id, program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date, loyalty_program_id FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT program_name, SUM(points) AS total_points FROM loyalty_programs JOIN customer_points ON loyalty_programs.loyalty_program_id = customer_points.loyalty_program_id GROUP BY program_name;

SELECT loyalty_program_id, program_name, points FROM loyalty_programs JOIN customer_points ON loyalty_programs.loyalty_program_id = customer_points.loyalty_program_id WHERE points > 1000 ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE points > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM loyalty_programs WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, points FROM customers WHERE points > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers LEFT JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM loyalty_program WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchase GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 2;

SELECT customer.first_name, point_transaction.points_earned FROM customer INNER JOIN point_transaction ON customer.customer_id = point_transaction.customer_id ORDER BY point_transaction.points_earned DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customer WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, points_earned, points_spent FROM point_transaction WHERE points_earned > points_spent;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program JOIN customer ON loyalty_program.program_id = customer.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_programs WHERE loyalty_program_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE loyalty_program_id = 2 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT reward_name, redemption_points FROM rewards WHERE loyalty_program_id = 3
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC, loyalty_program_id;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_programs WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY program_name ASC;

SELECT customer_name, email, loyalty_program_id FROM customers INNER JOIN loyalty_programs ON customers.loyalty_program_id = loyalty_programs.loyalty_program_id WHERE loyalty_programs.program_name = 'Gold' AND customers.email LIKE '%@gmail.com';

SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;

SELECT loyalty_program_id, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points_earned, SUM(points_spent) AS total_points_spent FROM points_tracking GROUP BY loyalty_program_id HAVING total_points_earned > total_points_spent ORDER BY loyalty_program_id ASC;
